How to permanently remove the ADs on a "Special Offers" Kindle through SE.

just call in and say youve narrowed down the kindles battery issues to the advertisements and that theyre randomly popping up on the screen. Say its not your fault so you dont want to pay for the privelege of having them off, and theyll turn them off at no extra charge! Just found this out! :)


Tried it out on my Kindle Fire HD 8 and it works perfectly! :D
